text: The following have been mayors of Marlborough, Wiltshire, England: *1310: John (Philip?) Godwyne *1378: John Jenewyne – MP for Marlborough, 1362, 1382, 1386 *1388: Robert Warner – MP for Marlbough, 1390 *1608: Richard Digges – MP for Marlborough 1597 to 1628 *1902-03: Mr Thomas Jackson (Liberal) * *1977: Cllr Lilian Ross *1978: Cllr Clifford Green *1979: Cllr Peter Waterkeyn * *1987: Cllr Clifford Green * *2010: Cllr Andrew Ross http://www.marlborough- tc.gov.uk/oldsite/images/documents/full-town/Minutes- Agendas-08052010-08052011/11%20October%202010%20minutes.pdf *2011: Cllr Alexander Kirk Wilson *2012: Cllr Edwina Fogg *2013: Cllr Guy Loosmore *2014: Cllr Marian Hannaford-Dobson *2015: Cllr Margaret Rose *2016: Cllr Noel Barrett-Morton *2017: Cllr Mervyn Hall *2018: Cllr Lisa Farrell The Mayoral year normally runs from May to May, but at times of local elections this may vary slightly. ==References== Marlborough
title: List of mayors of Marlborough, Wiltshire
